name: Gloves
description: Prefer waterproof gloves, such as made of suede or leather. Avoid knitting or crochet, as the wind easily passes through the wefts.

name: Beanie

name: Scarf
description: You can wrap the scarf around your neck to protect it from the cold, but also it can be used as a blanket or pillow when traveling by plane, bus and train.

name: Sunglass

name: Small Purse
description: Take a small, compact and neutral purse that can be used day and night.

name: Toothbrush
description: If you don't want to spend on travel size objects, take your toothbrush in an appropriate case to prevent it from getting dirty in the suitcase.

name: Toothpaste
description: Take a travel size toothpaste. And be sure to put it in a bag or waterproof bag.

name: Dental Floss
description: Nowadays there is even travel-sized dental floss. A great Chooseion!

name: Mini Shampoo
description: You can buy the shampoo at the destination, but if you prefer to take yours, choose a travel size and do not forget to put it in a bag or a waterproof bag.

name: Mini Conditioner
description: You can buy the conditioner at the destination, but if you prefer to take yours, choose a travel size and do not forget to put it in a bag or a waterproof bag.

name: Bar Soap
description: Choose a bar soap, because it is more practical to carry and prevents leaks in the backpack.

name: Microfiber Towel
description: Invest in microfiber towels, which dry very fast and are also thinner and more compact.

name: Deodorant
description: Rollon is the safest Chooseion when boarding a plane. In addition, it is more compact and lasts longer.

name: Hair Comb or Hairbrush
description: Take a travel size version and put inside a necessaire so that there is no risk of pulling threads from the clothes.

name: Razor Blade
description: Always pack it very well so there is no risk of pulling threads from the clothes.

name: Hair dyer or hair straightener
description: If you use devices to dry or style your hair, invest in one that is travel size.

name: Scrunchies
description: In addition to being useful for pinning hair, you can use it to close packages or even pin other objects.

name: Makeup Remover Wipes
description: The wipe Chooseion is the best for traveling, because there is no risk of leaking and is super practical.

name: Sunscreen Lotion
description: If you are going to a tropical destination, it is worth investing in Chooseions that are also repellent.

name: Makeup Necessaire
description: Take the basics and avoid liquid products.

name: Band-aid
description: In addition to being useful in case of minor injuries, it can be used to close packages.

name: Pain and Fever
description: If you make a very long trip, pay attention to the quantity.

name: Muscle Aches
description: It can be useful after a long period of backpacking or after a day spent walking through the destination.

name: Flu
description: Essential for trips to cold places.

name: Indigestion
description: On trips, we often try very different foods, with ingredients that don't go well.

name: Nausea
description: If you get sick easily on a car or bus trip for example, be sure to bring a sickness medicine.

name: Antiallergic
description: A useful medicine for those who suffer from allergies, such as insect bites or respiratory.

name: Diarrhea
description: If you are going to very hot destinations or with precarious resources, take medication for diarrhea and intestinal flora.

name: Earphone
description: Choose a sturdy model and if you are traveling with someone else, it is a good idea to bring a splitter.

name: Powerbank
description: To prevent your cell phone from running out of battery while traveling, always carry a portable battery with you.

name: Phone Charger
description: Don't forget to take your cell phone charger!

name: Universal Plug Adaptor
description: If you are going to an international destination, bring a universal or specific adapter to the destination.

name: Padlock
description: Take at least two padlocks to be used in public lockers and backpack.
